		<excerpt>
			<p>It was a dark and stormy night.</p>
			<p>But then all nights in Trenton seem dark and
			stormy to someone who has gone through what
			<emph>I</emph> have.
			</p>
			<definition-list>
				<term>Trenton</term>
				<definition>misery</definition>
			</definition-list>
		</excerpt>
